copy.tab1body: As a Member, you'll gain access to all of the fun. Visit the shops, fly into the Wilderness, host a party, and more! Plus ... experience even more gameplay with exclusive talent games and extra levels that are just for Members!
copy.tab2bodytitle: Shop at the Boutiques and Hair Salon!
copy.tab2body: Visit the shops and the hair salon to trade the things you've collected for new Fairy fashions and furnishings or a flitterific new hairstyle. And, as a Member, you'll have a bigger wardrobe and inventory with plenty of space to store all of your new Fairy clothes and decorations.
copy.tab3bodytitle: Tailor Fairy Fashions and Bake Treats!
copy.tab3body: Use the ingredients in your pouch to make stylish fashions and accessories to add to your Fairy wardrobe, to tinker furniture for your home, or to make tasty pixie dust filled goodies to take into the Wilderness.
copy.tab4body: Earn special gifts to add to your Fairy home and wardrobe by completing Members-only quests from Tinker Bell and her Fairy friends. Form an adventure group with your Fairy friends and use your talent skills to overcome obstacles in the Wilderness for more special ingredients and items!
copy.tab5body: Decorate your Fairy home with flitterific party decorations and host a pixie party. Invite your friends over and play pixielicious party games -- Pass the Popcorn, Simone Says, and Rock, Paper, Scissors.
copy.tab6body: Fly by Beck's Animal Nursery to choose a baby animal to care for and nurture. With fireflies, ladybugs, hummingbirds, and dragonflies, there's a perfect baby animal for every Fairy! Earn beautiful badges by helping Animal Friends.
copy.cardbody: Membership Cards and Magical Membership Cards can be redeemed for one month of Membership to PixieHollow.com.
copy.cancel:
Want to cancel your Membership?
Please visit our Account Manager and click on the Manage Membership tab.
